text.0: now praise as one who strives for strength the harnessing of agnis car.
text.1: the liberal the most splendid one.
text.2: who guiding worshippers aright withers untouched by age the foe.
text.3: when worshipped fair to look upon.
text.4: who for his glory is extolled at eve and morning in our homes.
text.6: who shines refulgent like the sun with brilliance and with fiery flame.
text.8: him atri agni have our songs strengthened according to his sway.
text.9: all glories hath he made his own.
text.10: may we with agnis indras help with somas yea of all the gods.
text.11: uninjured dwell together still and conquer those who fight with us.
